# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

```julia
function wrap_string(text::AbstractString; text_width::Int=10)
    lines = split(text, " ")
    max_length = length(lines)
    start_index = 1
    output = IOBuffer()
    for i in 2:max_length
        if (i - start_index) > text_width
            write(output, "\n")
            start_index = i
        end
        write(output, ' ')
        write(output, lines[i])
    end
    return String(take!(output))
end

# 示例
julia> wrap_string("Hello World This is a very long string that will be wrapped into multiple lines."; text_width=20)
"Hello World This\nis a very long\nstring that will\nbe wrapped into\nmultiple lines."
```
